title: Arcane Absorption Dagger
content:
, filling it with beads of blood. Dagger Light Finesse Thrown 0.45 480

Arcane Absorption Dagger

Arcane Absorption: When you kill an enemy with a melee attack, regain one of your spent 1st Level spell slots.

Weapon Enchantment +1

Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks:

The leather grip of this knife is decorated with jugs. As you turn it, you can see that the jug begins empty and fills.It's only when you reach die final image that you can see a man's severed head held over the jug, fillin
